{'id': '50dad6ec-314b-353b-968a-75811cb2b65e', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's Godrej Consumer mulls more gradual price hikes for soaps", 'description': '', 'summary': "India's Godrej Consumer Products will keep raising prices of its soaps gradually to protect margins amid rising palm oil prices, the consumer goods maker's top boss said on Monday.  Palm oil prices have surged in recent months due to floods in top producers Indonesia and Malaysia, forcing consumer goods makers, including Dove soapmaker Hindustan Unilever and Cinthol owner Godrej Consumer, to raise prices.", 'pubDate': '2025-03-10T11:13:19Z', 'displayTime': '2025-03-10T11:13:19Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/84aa3ee5ad40076af3d129d6913dc0e7', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 554, 'caption': 'FILE PHOTO: A man walks past the new Godrej brand logo during an event in Mumbai', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/fGT7ouC3mXqMwNnuR4IUbg--~B/aD01NTQ7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/84aa3ee5ad40076af3d129d6913dc0e7', 'width': 800, 'height': 554, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/u6GSPw0FU0pUJjIxMhPKPg--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/84aa3ee5ad40076af3d129d6913dc0e7', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-godrej-consumer-mulls-more-111319353.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-godrej-consumer-mulls-more-111319353.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

{'id': '5d177ff4-b532-3c59-ae30-3f822b8ecbaa', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's Hindustan Unilever drops to 8-month low on margin concerns", 'description': '', 'summary': 'The \'Clinic Plus\' shampoo maker on Wednesday forecast near-term margins at the lower end of its previous forecast range of 23%-24% as costs of key commodities such as palm oil and tea continue to rise and urban demand hit a two-year low in November.  The company posted a marginal rise in its third-quarter profit and a 2% increase in revenue.  Hindustan Unilever appeared to be more cautious about the demand outlook than at the previous analyst meet, Jefferies analyst Vivek Maheshwari said, calling it "a worry".', 'pubDate': '2025-01-23T05:05:37Z', 'displayTime': '2025-01-23T05:05:37Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/38777299d61dc29bbae7773965dbe599', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 536, 'caption': "Plastic sachets of Unilever's Sunsilk and Clinic Plus shampoo hang outside a shop in Mumbai", 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/qPpeTx5cIi.outpgtmsMbQ--~B/aD01MzY7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/38777299d61dc29bbae7773965dbe599', 'width': 800, 'height': 536, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/pXtAwCJilGCB92nFXHkqXg--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/38777299d61dc29bbae7773965dbe599', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-hindustan-unilever-drops-8-050537599.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-hindustan-unilever-drops-8-050537599.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

{'id': '79549c0f-4a18-3577-bc6f-85f67aa0424f', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "Unilever's India unit to buy 'Minimalist' beauty brand, sees near-term margin pressure", 'description': '', 'summary': "(Reuters) -Consumer goods maker Hindustan Unilever said on Wednesday it would buy the 'Minimalist' skin care brand and projected near-term margins at the lower end of its forecast range as it grapples with slowing urban demand.  This is Hindustan Unilever's latest investment in the beauty space as the conglomerate bets on Indian consumers splurging on skin and hair care.  The maker of soap brands 'Dove' and 'Pears' said it will buy a 90.5% stake in Uprising Science, which operates under the brand 'Minimalist', valuing the latter at 29.55 billion rupees ($342.3 million), including debt.", 'pubDate': '2025-01-22T10:16:13Z', 'displayTime': '2025-01-22T12:13:16Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/6cab9f0dab7f17feaacd4d77916eae28', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 581, 'caption': 'A pedestrian walks past the Hindustan Unilever Limited (HUL) headquarters in Mumbai', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/OuXnI_e78Bp43URLlE1tbA--~B/aD01ODE7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/6cab9f0dab7f17feaacd4d77916eae28', 'width': 800, 'height': 581, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/2s10bi1zRmBTyTZ8L3ocyA--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/6cab9f0dab7f17feaacd4d77916eae28', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/unilevers-india-unit-posts-marginal-101613110.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/unilevers-india-unit-posts-marginal-101613110.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

{'id': '598c7ea1-c88a-349f-953b-a83909dd8dfa', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "Unilever's India unit misses profit view as higher costs, urban slowdown weigh", 'description': '', 'summary': 'The Dove soap-maker reported a near-4% fall in profit to 26.12 billion rupees ($310.8 million) for the second quarter ended Sept. 30, missing analysts\' estimates of 26.88 billion rupees, according to data compiled by LSEG. {'id': '45be4ec4-b985-3e86-8c42-590ea8ca66f3', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "Unilever's India quarterly profit disappoints; sees signs of rebound in rural sales", 'description': '', 'summary': "BENGALURU/CHENNAI (Reuters) -Hindustan Unilever, the Indian arm of UK's Unilever, posted a bigger-than-expected fall in quarterly profit on Wednesday, but indicated signs of a much-anticipated sales recovery in rural areas.  Lower prices of select raw materials have also allowed a few of Hindustan Unilever's brands as well as that of peers such as Saffola-owner Marico to cut prices and stay competitive.  Hindustan Unilever said its profit fell nearly 6% to 24.06 billion rupees ($288.9 million), missing estimates of 24.44 billion rupees, according to LSEG.", 'pubDate': '2024-04-24T10:52:38Z', 'displayTime': '2024-04-24T13:28:47Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/bd0561aecd4bc1fee07dad5c64b2532e', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 581, 'caption': 'FILE PHOTO: A pedestrian walks past the Hindustan Unilever Limited (HUL) headquarters in Mumbai', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/DlhMl4VAKVQFbwFt.xl9FA--~B/aD01ODE7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/bd0561aecd4bc1fee07dad5c64b2532e', 'width': 800, 'height': 581, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/PALPCBsZD826vdlLmbjTXQ--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/bd0561aecd4bc1fee07dad5c64b2532e', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/unilevers-india-arm-q4-profit-105238386.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/unilevers-india-arm-q4-profit-105238386.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}
